Is it complete with menu and special features?

What a fantastic (and important!) film!  Thanks you so much for the download.

To SlavekG - it is an exact clone of the DVD: it includes menu, choice of spoken languages (English, French, Italian and Spanish) and subtitles (19 different languages).  Unfortunately there are no extras on the DVD except for a few trailers.
